name: Maple-Peach Ice Cream Topping
author: Bren
summary: This simple, quick peach sauce is great for ice cream but tastes equally good on french toast, waffles, or granola. To peel or not to peel, the choice is yours! I left the peel on as it helps to keep the peaches intact.
ingredients: 3 medium (2-1/2" dia) (approx 4 per lb)s ripe peaches
directions: Cut each peach in half, remove pit, and cut each half into 6 slices
Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat until slightly browned, 2 to 4 minutes
Place peach slices into the butter, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook for 3 minutes, turning carefully
Add maple syrup, lemon zest, and nutmeg to the pot and cook for 2 to 3 more minutes
Allow to cool slightly before serving
